thread.section_title: Teleflora Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Teleflora | www.teleflora.com
thread.title: Aruna Aggarwal

author: Aruna Aggarwal
title: Aruna Aggarwal
text: I called to order 5 bouquets I picked 3 of same kind my close friend received one and sent me a photo which was nowhere like pictured on website The arrangement I chose was citrus smiles and the bouquet elicited was straggly poorly arranged ( I could do a better job )and did not contain as many roses as I picked online Rep who helped me was polite but it took an hour to order called to complain they are going to pick bouquet up and redeliver cancelled another order with them Take my advice take the picture go to your local florist and have them arrange it you will get a better deal
